tool_description: Generates properly formatted citations from source metadata in various academic styles (APA, MLA, Chicago, IEEE, etc.).

citation_style.description: Citation style to use (APA, MLA, Chicago, IEEE, Harvard)

source_type.description: Type of source (journal, book, conference, website, thesis)

error_messages: Missing required field: title, authors, publication_date, citation_style, and source_type are required.
Invalid citation style: Use one of APA, MLA, Chicago, IEEE, Harvard.
Invalid source type: Use one of journal, book, conference, website, thesis.
Invalid date format: Use YYYY-MM-DD format for publication_date.
Too many authors: Maximum 20 authors allowed.
Empty author list: At least one author must be provided.
usage: Provide title, authors array, publication_date, citation_style, and source_type. Include optional fields like journal_name, volume, issue, pages, doi, url based on source type for complete citations.

formatted_citation.description: Complete formatted citation in requested style
